# 2024 Docs

## Release notes

- [January 2024 security and quality rollup](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/release-notes/2024/01-09-january-security-and-quality-rollup.md): Learn about the improvements in the .NET Framework January 2024 security and quality rollup.
- [January 2024 cumulative update preview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/release-notes/2024/01-23-january-preview-cumulative-update.md): Learn about the improvements in the .NET Framework January 2024 cumulative update preview.
- [February 2024 security and quality rollup](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/release-notes/2024/02-14-february-security-and-quality-rollup.md): Learn about the improvements in the .NET Framework February 2024 security and quality rollup.
- [March 2024 cumulative update preview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/release-notes/2024/03-26-march-preview-cumulative-update.md): Learn about the improvements in the .NET Framework March 2024 cumulative update preview.
- [April 2024 security and quality rollup](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/release-notes/2024/04-09-april-security-and-quality-rollup.md): Learn about the improvements in the .NET Framework April 2024 security and quality rollup.
- [April 2024 cumulative update preview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/release-notes/2024/04-23-april-preview-cumulative-update.md): Learn about the improvements in the .NET Framework April 2024 cumulative update preview.
- [May 2024 security and quality rollup](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/release-notes/2024/05-14-may-security-and-quality-rollup.md): Learn about the improvements in the .NET Framework May 2024 security and quality rollup.
- [June 2024 cumulative update preview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/release-notes/2024/06-25-june-preview-cumulative-update.md): Learn about the improvements in the .NET Framework June 2024 cumulative update preview.
- [July 2024 security and quality rollup](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/release-notes/2024/07-09-july-security-and-quality-rollup.md): Learn about the improvements in the .NET Framework July 2024 security and quality rollup.
- [July 2024 cumulative update preview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/release-notes/2024/07-25-july-preview-cumulative-update.md): Learn about the improvements in the .NET Framework July 2024 cumulative update preview.
- [August 2024 security and quality rollup](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/release-notes/2024/08-13-august-security-and-quality-rollup.md): Learn about the improvements in the .NET Framework August 2024 security and quality rollup.
- [October 2024 security and quality rollup](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/release-notes/2024/10-08-october-security-and-quality-rollup.md): Learn about the improvements in the .NET Framework October 2024 security and quality rollup.
- [October 2024 cumulative update preview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/release-notes/2024/10-22-october-preview-cumulative-update.md): Learn about the improvements in the .NET Framework October 2024 cumulative update preview.
- [November 2024 security and quality rollup](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/release-notes/2024/11-12-november-security-and-quality-rollup.md): Learn about the improvements in the .NET Framework November 2024 security and quality rollup.
- [November 2024 cumulative update preview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/release-notes/2024/11-21-november-preview-cumulative-update.md): Learn about the improvements in the .NET Framework November 2024 cumulative update preview.
